hopobject.name: BBB_HS_USB
hopobject.body: The maximum speed I reached till now (in Angstrom)is about 8 MB/s but it's too slow . In my project I need at least 25 MB/s that is near half that can be achieved ideally.I use HS USB Flash that tested for such speeds.
hopobject.shortdesc: Transferring data at high speed (at least 25 MBytes/s,half the max HS due to some H/W - S/W latencies)from internal eMMC to USB Flash and vice versa in BeagleBone Black.
